New Records: CJ McCollum tied his career-high with 50 points
Key Match Events: CJ McCollum hit a 21-foot jumper to give New Orleans a 128-111 lead
Jordan Poole scored 24 points for the Wizards but was affected by a hard fall under the basket with 4:38 left in the third quarter
Pre-Game Insights: A moment of silence was held before tipoff due to the recent New Year's Day attack in the French Quarter
Post-Match Reflections: The Pelicans snapped an 11-game losing streak with a 132-120 victory over the Washington Wizards
New Orleans benefitted from the return from injury of reserve guard Jose Alvarado
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans tied a season-high with 18 made 3s
The Wizards scored a season-high 72 points in the paint
Others: The Pelicans have the NBA's worst record at 6-29
The Pelicans will visit the Wizards on Sunday night
